name: Marie: Crying Souls
description:
“Adam has heard rumors of a haunted forest teeming with the souls of the departed possessing a malevolent doll that no person has ever seen before with their own eyes. He has always been interested in the paranormal and always wanted to debunk rumors like these, no matter how dangerous they sound. And so, he sets off to the location of the rumored forest to find the possessed doll. But no matter how much you prepare and how curious you are, you will soon realize that some rumors are best left untouched…”

The game is a first-person horror game, where you play as Adam, an aspiring investigator who has a fond interest in the supernatural. One day, he heard about a rumor of a haunted forest from his friend.....

Created for the purpose of a university project by Alex Alimbuyuguen
